data.text: God, arise and scatter your enemies,
Like wind blows smoke away,
But righteous people should be joyful;
Sing to God; sing to praise him;
God, who lives in his sacred temple, is like [MET] a father to those who are orphans,
For those who have no one to live with, he provides families to live with.
God, you led your people out of Egypt,
After you did that, because when you, the God worshiped by us Israeli people, appeared to us at Sinai Mountain,,
You caused plenty of rain to fall on your land,
Your people built homes there;
The Lord gave a message,
They proclaimed, “Many kings and their armies are running away from our army!”
Even those women who were in the pens taking care of the sheep received some of those things;
When Almighty God scattered the enemy kings and their armies,
There is a very high mountain in the Bashan region,
But the people who live near that mountain should not [RHQ] envy those who live near Zion,
After we defeated all our enemies,
He ascended the sacred mountain where his temple is,
Praise the Lord, who helps us carry our heavy loads every day;
Our God is the God who saves us;
But God will smash the heads of his enemies,
The Lord said, “I will bring back the corpses of those who were killed in Bashan,
I will do that in order that you may wash your feet in their blood,
God, many people see you march triumphantly into your sacred temple,
The singers are in front, and the people who play stringed instruments are at the rear,
They are all singing, “You Israeli people, praise God when you gather together;
First come the people of the tribe of Benjamin, the smallest tribe,
God, show people that you are very powerful;
Show that power from your temple in Jerusalem,
Rebuke your enemies, such as those in Egypt who are like wild hippopotamuses/animals that live in the reeds;
Then people will bring gifts of bronze (OR, of cloth) to you from Egypt;
You people who are citizens of kingdoms/countries all over the world, sing to God!
Sing to the God, the one who rides across the sky,
Proclaim that God is very powerful;
God is awesome as he comes out of his sacred temple;
